name: Vapor (DeadPixel, muffnbuttn, IRLAnimeBoi)
description:
VAPOR

A game about steam made in two days for Mini Jam 102.

You control Drip, a brave little fellow tasked with traveling to the Great Boiler to kindle its flames. You'll travel through rooms full of Sokoban-style pipe and crate pushing puzzles to make your way.

CONTROLS
  • WASD/Arrow Keys - Move
  • E - Interact
    • Pipes will rotate
    • Slide through vents (kinda sus?!)
  • Escape - Pause/Restart
HOW TO PLAY

As a Sokoban-style game you can only push moveable objects like pipes and crates, never pull. You can rotate pipes to fit into the desired spot. The goal is to make connections from the pipe venting steam to the receiver pipes in the map. Use vents to travel around and get to tight spots you wouldn't be able to otherwise!
